trans-unit.source: Text Module Print Management

seg-source.mrk: Text Module Print Management

trans-unit.source: The Text Module Print Management page creates the link between text lines and the objects to be printed and/or shown.

seg-source.mrk: The Text Module Print Management page creates the link between text lines and the objects to be printed and/or shown.

trans-unit.source: : Text Module Print Management for sales documents

seg-source.mrk: : Text Module Print Management for sales documents

trans-unit.source: The fields on this page are described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The fields on this page are described in the following table.

trans-unit.source: FastTab

seg-source.mrk: FastTab

trans-unit.source: Field

seg-source.mrk: Field

trans-unit.source: Description

seg-source.mrk: Description

trans-unit.source: General

seg-source.mrk: General

trans-unit.source: Code

seg-source.mrk: Code

trans-unit.source: Unique identifier for the print management record.

seg-source.mrk: Unique identifier for the print management record.

trans-unit.source: Description

seg-source.mrk: Description

trans-unit.source: Short description of the print management record.

seg-source.mrk: Short description of the print management record.

trans-unit.source: Line

seg-source.mrk: Line

trans-unit.source: Output Type

seg-source.mrk: Output Type

trans-unit.source: Determines where text is printed or shown. The options are Report and Table.

seg-source.mrk: Determines where text is printed or shown.
The options are Report and Table.

trans-unit.source: Output ID

seg-source.mrk: Output ID

trans-unit.source: Indicates the specific ID of the selected output type. This list is filtered by reports and tables entered in the Text Module Objects Setup table.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the specific ID of the selected output type.
This list is filtered by reports and tables entered in the Text Module Objects Setup table.

trans-unit.source: Output Document Type

seg-source.mrk: Output Document Type

trans-unit.source: Used with Table objects to indicate the type of document. For example, enter Object Type = 36 with Object Document Type = 1 to have text appear on the sales order header.

seg-source.mrk: Used with Table objects to indicate the type of document.
For example, enter Object Type = 36 with Object Document Type = 1 to have text appear on the sales order header.

trans-unit.source: Output Name

seg-source.mrk: Output Name

trans-unit.source: Displays the name of the output ID/output document type.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the name of the output ID/output document type.

trans-unit.source: Description

seg-source.mrk: Description

trans-unit.source: User-defined description of the print management line record.

seg-source.mrk: User-defined description of the print management line record.

trans-unit.source: As illustrated in Fig. 1, a SALES code has been set up with various sales reports and tables. This means that text with Print Mgt. Code = SALES will appear on the noted reports and will be displayed in pop-up pages for header and line text in sales quotes and orders.

seg-source.mrk: As illustrated in <MadCap:xref href="#_Ref391969044" class="Figure" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Fig. 1</MadCap:xref>, a SALES code has been set up with various sales reports and tables.
This means that text with <span class="Bold">Print Mgt.
Code = SALES will appear on the noted reports and will be displayed in pop-up pages for header and line text in sales quotes and orders.

trans-unit.source: Exercise – Set Up Print Management for Sales and Purchase Documents

seg-source.mrk: Exercise – Set Up Print Management for Sales and Purchase Documents

trans-unit.source: Your company wants to use header and line text on sales and purchases as follows:

seg-source.mrk: Your company wants to use header and line text on sales and purchases as follows:

trans-unit.source: Sales – header and line text printed on Order Confirmation report and pop-up pages to display header and line text during sales order creation.

seg-source.mrk: Sales – header and line text printed on Order Confirmation report and pop-up pages to display header and line text during sales order creation.

trans-unit.source: Purchases – header and line text printed on Order report and pop-up pages to display header and line text during purchase order creation.

seg-source.mrk: Purchases – header and line text printed on Order report and pop-up pages to display header and line text during purchase order creation.

trans-unit.source: This exercise explains how to complete this setup, which will be used in exercises in the following sections.

seg-source.mrk: This exercise explains how to complete this setup, which will be used in exercises in the following sections.

trans-unit.source: Set Up Print Management for Sales Documents

seg-source.mrk: Set Up Print Management for Sales Documents

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to set up print management for sales documents:

seg-source.mrk: Follow these steps to set up print management for sales documents:

trans-unit.source: In the navigation pane, click cc|text module > Lists > Text Module Print Mgt. List.

seg-source.mrk: In the navigation pane, click cc|text module > Lists > Text Module Print Mgt.
List.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click New.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click New.

trans-unit.source: In the Code field, type “S-Orders”.

seg-source.mrk: In the Code field, type “S-Orders”.

trans-unit.source: In the Description field, type “Sales Order Documents”.

seg-source.mrk: In the Description field, type “Sales Order Documents”.

trans-unit.source: In the Lines FastTab, enter 205 in the Output ID field.

seg-source.mrk: In the Lines FastTab, enter 205 in the Output ID field.

trans-unit.source: In the next line, click the arrow in the Output Type field and select Table.

seg-source.mrk: In the next line, click the arrow in the Output Type field and select Table.

trans-unit.source: In the Output ID field, enter 36.

seg-source.mrk: In the Output ID field, enter 36.

trans-unit.source: In the Output Document Type field, enter 1.

seg-source.mrk: In the Output Document Type field, enter 1.

trans-unit.source: In the next line, enter 37 in the Output ID field.

seg-source.mrk: In the next line, enter 37 in the Output ID field.

trans-unit.source: In the Output Document Type field, enter 1.

seg-source.mrk: In the Output Document Type field, enter 1.

trans-unit.source: : Text Module Print Management set up done for sales order documents

seg-source.mrk: : Text Module Print Management set up done for sales order documents

trans-unit.source: Do not close the Text Module Print Management page.

seg-source.mrk: Do not close the Text Module Print Management page.

trans-unit.source: Set Up Print Management for Purchase Documents

seg-source.mrk: Set Up Print Management for Purchase Documents

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to set up print management for purchase documents:

seg-source.mrk: Follow these steps to set up print management for purchase documents:

trans-unit.source: In the Text Module Print Management page, click the arrow on the OK button and then click OK & New.

seg-source.mrk: In the Text Module Print Management page, click the arrow on the OK button and then click OK & New.

trans-unit.source: In the Code field, type “P-Orders”.

seg-source.mrk: In the Code field, type “P-Orders”.

trans-unit.source: In the Description field, type “Purchase Order Documents”.

seg-source.mrk: In the Description field, type “Purchase Order Documents”.

trans-unit.source: In the Lines FastTab, enter 405 in the Output ID field.

seg-source.mrk: In the Lines FastTab, enter 405 in the Output ID field.

trans-unit.source: In the next line, click the arrow in the Output Type field and select Table.

seg-source.mrk: In the next line, click the arrow in the Output Type field and select Table.

trans-unit.source: In the Output ID field, enter 38.

seg-source.mrk: In the Output ID field, enter 38.

trans-unit.source: In the Output Document Type field, enter 1.

seg-source.mrk: In the Output Document Type field, enter 1.

trans-unit.source: In the next line, enter 39 in the Output ID field.

seg-source.mrk: In the next line, enter 39 in the Output ID field.

trans-unit.source: In the Output Document Type field, enter 1.

seg-source.mrk: In the Output Document Type field, enter 1.

trans-unit.source: : Text Module Print Management set up done for purchase order documents

seg-source.mrk: : Text Module Print Management set up done for purchase order documents

trans-unit.source: Click OK to close the Text Module Print Management page.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to close the Text Module Print Management page.

trans-unit.source: Assignment to Text Records

seg-source.mrk: Assignment to Text Records

trans-unit.source: The Print Management Code can be added to text assigned to master data or standard text in the lines of the Text Module Card (refer to topic “Lines FastTab” on page 1) or in the Edit Text page (refer to topic “Edit Text Page” on page 1), generally accessible from document headers/lines.

seg-source.mrk: The Print Management Code can be added to text assigned to master data or standard text in the lines of the Text Module Card (refer to topic “Lines FastTab” on page 1) or in the Edit Text page (refer to topic “Edit Text Page” on page 1), generally accessible from document headers/lines.

trans-unit.source: : Edit Text page opened from Sales Order header

seg-source.mrk: : Edit Text page opened from Sales Order header

trans-unit.source: As previously stated, assigning the SALES print management code to text in the sales order header means that it will appear in the Order Confirmation report. To prevent the text from appearing on the report, simply remove the value in the Print Mgt. Code field.

seg-source.mrk: As previously stated, assigning the SALES print management code to text in the sales order header means that it will appear in the Order Confirmation report.
To prevent the text from appearing on the report, simply remove the value in the <span class="Bold">Print Mgt.
Code field.

trans-unit.source: Refer to the following sections for more information about working with print management codes.

seg-source.mrk: Refer to the following sections for more information about working with print management codes.
